meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #756.

td.p: Pat McAnaney, a counselor from Carmel Valley
Linnie Blattner, a homemaker from Santa Monica, California
Sandra Gore, a researcher originally from Boston, Massachusetts (whose 4-day cash winnings total $47,507)

tr.td: POETRY
MULTIPLE CHOICE
THE OLD WEST
TENNIS RECORDS
ACADEMY AWARDS
"T" TIME

div.onmouseover:

(Pat: What are tweeds?)
(Sandra: What are tablecloths?)
[Prior to the start of Double Jeopardy!, Alex said "twills" was an acceptable response, Linnie was credited, and the other two players\' responses were voided and their money returned.]

textiles (twills accepted)

Linnie
')
